channel.title: [PI] Need Help With Client Sided Stuff
channel.description:
Hey Thanks for reading, basically i have hamachi to test my server ready for release, yet my friend changed ip to my hamachi ip in client.java using ctrl +f ="server =" and changed that.
Yet it doesent seem to work even after compiling @echo off Title Building.. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause Is my compiler code
Is the message i get when compiled Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. Press any key to continue . . .
This is sucessful right? is so can you help me so my friend/s can connect. Thanks im new to rsps coding btw so :p
Also when i use range probs mage to, i hit from far a way but auto run into melee distance, fix?

item.title: [PI] Need Help With Client Sided Stuff
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

In your title you said client sided stuff…There is a section for client sided things. This is the server sided help…

OT: Did they connect to your hamachi? Also you have to make sure that your firewall or anything isn’t blocking the connections.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Need Help With Client Sided Stuff

item.title: [PI] Need Help With Client Sided Stuff
item.dc:creator: @archiebaker archiebaker
item.description:
@archiebaker wrote:

Hey Thanks for reading, basically i have hamachi to test my server ready for release, yet my friend changed ip to my hamachi ip in client.java using
ctrl +f =“server =” and changed that.

Yet it doesent seem to work even after compiling
@echo off
Title Building…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause
Is my compiler code

Is the message i get when compiled
Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
Press any key to continue . . .

This is sucessful right? is so can you help me so my friend/s can connect. Thanks im new to rsps coding btw so

Also when i use range probs mage to, i hit from far a way but auto run into melee distance, fix?
